title: Chapter 4537 - Chapter 4537: 3536 Annihilating The Evil Sequence Faction 2
body:
Chapter 4537 - Chapter 4537: 3536 Annihilating The Evil Sequence Faction 2

Chapter 4537: 3536 annihilating the evil sequence faction 2

In just 100 years, none of the Great Beings of the evil sequence faction had expected that the Dragon Palace alliance had already arrived in their territory.

They had already invaded their universe!

This made them extremely shocked and furious!

“There are still over 100 universes between the Yin Demon Universe and us. We can’t just watch them invade!”

The Lord of disaster looked at the other three primal chaos existences and said in a deep voice!

“We have to clash with them anyway. Why don’t we just go up and welcome them!”

The old man with the bamboo hat said in a deep voice!

They were waiting here to clash with the Dragon King of the Dragon Palace.

Why don’t they just go up and welcome him.

The other party had already entered their territory, so they were more passive while waiting here!

“Alright, let’s clash with the Dragon King. I want to see how the Dragon King will fight us!”

The experts with countless tentacles connected to their heads also coldly spoke!

“Find the location of all the experts from the Dragon Palace Alliance. We will directly charge over!”

The Lord of disaster looked at his subordinates in front and coldly ordered!

“Yes, Sir!”

The group of dao-level powerhouses responded immediately!

They went to search for information immediately.

They didn’t act rashly because they had some misgivings.

They hadn’t figured out the trump card of the Dragon Palace yet!

The powerhouses from the evil sequence faction sent people to investigate.

This was their territory, so they were able to investigate very quickly!

While they were investigating, Wang Xian continued to fly in the direction of the evil sequence universe.

When he passed by some universes on the way, Wang Xian entered them and started to search for some information. He also obtained more information about the evil sequence universe.

For example, the evil sequence universe. Some universes were directly connected to the evil sequence universe.

Some universes were connected to universes that were closer to the evil sequence universe.

This brought great convenience to Wang Xian!

It was much faster to teleport through the teleportation array.

Buzz Buzz

Buzz Buzz

Wang Xian rushed over through the teleportation array and quickly arrived at a universe that was closer to the evil sequence universe!

He flew out of the universe and continued flying forward.

Not long after, he arrived at the front of the evil sequence universe!

Standing in front of the evil sequence universe from afar, Wang Xian could sense the powerful energy aura in the universe in front of him.

“Are they all gathered here?”

Wang Xian mumbled as a smile appeared on his face!

He did not enter the evil sequence universe rashly.

There were more than 400 heaven origin creation realm powerhouses in the evil sequence universe.

There were four Primal Chaos Realm powerhouses!

There were 21 dao-level powerhouses!

There were more than 200 control-level powerhouses!

The rest were all beginner-level powerhouses!

The quality of the heaven origin creator-level powerhouses in the evil sequence faction was very high.

For example, in the Justice Alliance, they had more than 300 heaven origin creator-level powerhouses, but there were only about 100 control-level powerhouses.

The rest were all beginner-level powerhouses.

In terms of the number of control level powerhouses, they were far inferior to the evil sequence faction.

With so many powerhouses, even if Wang Xian were to fight them head-on, he wouldn’t be their match.

Although the other party couldn’t kill him, he was also safe and couldn’t do anything to the other party.

Therefore, there was only one way — curse!

Through the demon spirit’s curse, he could kill them bit by bit!

In addition, he also wanted to see the limit of his curse!

Buzz

With a move of his palm, a virtual image appeared in front of him.

This was the virtual image of the axe sword demon.

Wang Xian now controlled the aura of all the experts from the evil sequence faction and could curse all of them!

Buzz

The moment Wang Xian’s curse started, he clenched his fist toward the virtual image of the axe sword demon.

Cracks started to appear on the Phantom and it started to collapse!

Axe Sword Demon was the weakest existence at the chaos level. It was easier to kill him with a curse than the Lord of Calamity!

Of course, there was a limit to how easy it was!

“Eh? What’s going on? My Body!”

At the same time, when Wang Xian’s attack started.

At the center of the evil sequence universe, axe sword demon, who was floating in the air, suddenly felt that he had suffered a terrifying attack.

Cracks instantly appeared on his body!

After seeing the sudden change in his body, sword demon axe’s expression changed drastically, and he couldn’t help but Roar in a low voice!

His words instantly attracted the attention of all the experts around him.

The eyes of the Lord of disaster and the others focused, and they immediately locked onto Sword Demon Axe’s body!

“What’s the situation?”

The chaos-level elder wearing a bamboo hat looked at sword demon axe, and a shocked expression appeared on his face.

As far as his eyes could see, axe sword demon’s body was rapidly cracking!

It was rapidly collapsing!

This was very inconceivable for a primal chaos level expert.

“This kind of attack?”

The Lord of Disaster’s expression changed drastically when he saw this scene, and his pupils constricted slightly.

He was very familiar with this kind of attack!

“Weng!”

His body moved, and he immediately arrived in front of axe sword demon.

“It’s a curse, a curse from that Dragon King!”

The Lord of disaster growled with a grave expression!

“Save me!”

When Axe sword demon heard the Lord of Disaster’s words, his expression changed greatly and he immediately asked for help!

“Damn it, how is this possible? is that Dragon King around? How did he do such a curse?”

Countless chaos-level experts connected to the head immediately extended their tentacles and connected to his body.

Energy surged into axe sword demon’s body.

The old man with the bamboo hat and the Lord of disaster also came to help!

“How is it?”

The three people’s energy entered his body, and the Lord of disaster asked Axe Sword Demon.

“No, it’s impossible. The life force in my body is still draining rapidly. I can only hold on for a few hours at most!”

Sword Demon Axe roared, a trace of fear on his face!

After all, he had just completed his breakthrough and did not have a powerful resurrection treasure in his hands.

Once he died, his strength would fall to the Great Dao level.

At that time, he would need a large amount of resources to recover!

“What’s going on? What happened to our sword demon axe?”

“Our Lord Axe Sword Demon seems to have been attacked and cursed. Oh My God, this? ? ?”

“Is it the Dragon King’s Curse? That Dragon King’s curse can instantly kill two great dao existences. It’s extremely terrifying!”

At the same time, all the experts from the evil sequence camp were stunned.

One of their chaos-level lords had actually suffered an inexplicable attack.

This left them extremely shocked!

That Dragon King was actually able to curse from such a far distance?

“All great dao-level experts, come over!”

When the Lord of Disaster Heard Axe Sword Demon’s words, he ordered with a gloomy expression! ! !
